channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Two deep potholes on Charlton lane near Wolfe crescent road, 22nd February
item.description:
Two potholes- deep and dangerous on Charlton Lane near Wolfe crescent road. These have been reported numerous times and only temporary fixes have been done. Still water leak as well.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Charlton Lane, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Disgusting food left around base of tree, 22nd February
item.description:
Someone has (again) dumped food at the base of the tree. This is a recurring problem. Please could the Council look into a permanent solution for this issue aside from just cleaning it up every time?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Colne Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping at gibson gardens, 22nd February
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Northwold Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Temporary traffic lights, 22nd February
item.description:
The temporary traffic lights cannot be seen from the stop line causing cars to remain at the lights on green and road rage. Please either relocate the lights, introduce secondary lights, or relocate the stop line.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woolwich Road, Charlton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
